author: Baris Ozaydinli
comment: Great one-stop fitness pal to help with all my training and nutrition needs!

author: Mustafa AYAZ
comment: Premium üyelik aldım hala aktif olmadı mail attım dönüşü yapılmadı

reply.author: FitWell Limited
reply.content: Merhaba Mustafa. Hesabını kontrol ettiğimde aktivasyonu başarılı şekilde gerçekleştirmiş olduğunu görüyorum. Hala herhangi bir sorun yaşıyorsan bize destek@fitwell.com.tr adresinden ulaşabilirsin. Herhangi bir sorun yaşamıyor ve uygulamamızı beğendiysen yorumunu ve puanı güncelleyebilir misin? Şimdiden teşekkür ederiz.

author: Amir Razak
comment: Impresive workout.

author: Ilmiye Kasimoglulari
comment: Adınlarımı saymamak konusunda ısrarcı bir uygulama diğer uygulamalarda rahatlıkla adımlarımı sayabilirken bu uygulamayla yapamıyorum eğer adım saysaydı beş yıldızı bile hakedebilirdi

reply.author: FitWell Limited
reply.content:
Merhaba! Öncelikle uygulama menüsünden "Ayarlar" seçeneğini tıklayarak açılan ekranda adım sayarın kapalı olmadığından emin olmakta fayda var.  Yine de haklısın, bazı telefon modelleri adım saymamak konusunda oldukça ısrarcı olabiliyor maalesef. 🙁 Problemin devam ederse, bize destek@fitwell.com.tr adresinden ulaş lütfen.
Sevgiler, Fitwell ekibi.

author: kristen weitnauer
comment: Charged me twice fore 43 dollars. I never paid for it. Now I can't get a refund for them and it's bogus. This app is a joke. Becareful with this app.

reply.author: FitWell Limited
reply.content: Hello Kristen. Please reach us at support@fitwell.co, so we can take a deeper look into your case and certainly help you out. As a side note, let's not forget all subscription payments are authorized and managed by Google Play and can be seen under your Google profile. Hope this helps!

author: Satadal Guru
comment: Hi I am facing a problem regarding my workout video when I start a workout it's got download successfully but when it starts the main workout video it got stuck after previewing the workout of 10s. I tried different method to solve this problem like reinstall the app, clear the workout video chache but nothing happen. I tried to report this to you in the app through create ticket but it's also not working as well and give an error while sending.

reply.author: FitWell Limited
reply.content: Hi Satadal. It seems a technical hiccup on our side gave you an error. The good news is that it should all be sorted out now, and your next exercise videos should play just fine. 💪 Feel free to reach us at support@fitwell.co for any other issues. Happy exercising! 😊

author: Hope Dingman
comment: It would be nice if we could choose how many times we eat a day. And only give us 1 thing to read a day so we dont end up just ignoring them. Also if it would not reset at midnight I work 3rd shift so my day does not end untill i go to sleep at 9am.

author: enes özel
comment: "Pro" is very expensive..

author: Mitchell Wilson
comment: Good tracking and good coaching but the video player is so sensitive that it pauses every time I put it in my pocket to actually do the workout.  Fix that and I'll re-subscribe

author: Yasin Kaya
comment: Great app! I'm a premium user and I suggests everyone who would like to arrange their lives.

author: Deniz Tasdogen
comment: Great app

author: Elysia Taniguchi
comment: I like that it connects to google fit, but I have to use a different app for meal tracking because I don't care to pay for the feature on this app when I can get it free in another app.

reply.author: FitWell Limited
reply.content: Hi, Elysia. We had a short technical hiccup that is the likely cause of your problem. If you still can't login, please contact us at support@fitwell.co and we'll do our best to help you. We are sorry for the inconvenience.

author: finessekidkanega
comment: It's a great app and keeps me in shape!

author: Liz Legere
comment: Is not working when I try to sign up to Premium

author: burak
comment: "Fit Test" indirilirken %51'de kaliyor.

author: Sinem E.
comment: Yeni güncellemeyle mahvettiniz resmen 1/2 1/8 vs. seceneklerinizi goremedim o sekilde gayet iyiydi iyice karistirmissiniz simdi.Uygulamayi duzenli her gun kullaniyordum yaklasik 2-3 aydir oldukca da faydasini gordum ama artik çöp oldu benim icin

reply.author: FitWell Limited
reply.content: Merhaba Sinem, yemeklerde çok daha detaylı bilgiler verdiğimiz için ve yemek sayımızı 10 kattan fazla büyüttüğümüz için bir miktar sistemsel güncelleme yapmak durumunda kaldık. Yalnız sizin şikayetlerinizi de değerlendiriyoruz ve bunlar için güncellemeler planlıyoruz. Geri bildirimin için çok teşekkür ederiz.

author: Jovvian George
comment: Good app for a person to force himself to get some total body activity. Just like the the other apps, it's free for basic training and the best workout regimen are hidden behind the premium membership. On the flip side , the app syncs to google fit but it doesn't reflect the number of steps taken in the reports menufor some reason.

author: Александр Кокин
comment: Can't even start essential Fit Test! Downloading of the workout stops on 51%. And there is no way to proceed without it. Tried to create a ticket in the app. Useless. Got an error and nothing has been saved. Very upset.

author: John Hernandez
comment: The only thing that pisses me off is that I can't subscribe through play store. Any way to buy a unlocked version?

author: April Marjes
comment: This app is amazing! I love the workouts and it keeps me really motivated. I'm just not a fan of the meal suggestions -- they're kinda hard to find.
title: Just not into the meal suggestions

author: S K
comment: The idea behind this app is simply amazing in terms of the offered features/available workouts and high quality videos. This is exactly what I was looking for. Unfortunately the app is extremely buggy at this point and it is not ready for daily use .  I use Nexus 6P running Android 7.1.1 and every time I click on Start Workout, it takes on average 3-4 minutes to load up the video. Then you hear the audio for 2-3 seconds and the app crashes. It takes about 2 minutes to restart the video and it crashes again and again and again. Out of about 15 attempts, the app managed to play the workout video 3 times.   This app allows you to play your own music but the moment you start FitWell it takes over your music feed. Also their own workout music stops playing after about 5 minutes of starting a workout, so you are stuck finishing it in silence. There are also few smaller bugs as well. Like I said, I really love this app but I am going to cancel my 1-month trial period for now and give this app another try in a year or two.

author: Jena Roland
comment: I like how this app tracks a lot to help me reach my goal but for some reason my steps don't show up. I use Google fit to track my steps but they aren't transferring to the app.
title: I like it a lot but

author: Karan S
comment: Nice app, but no useful routine is free

author: Adir Avraham
comment: I cant start the fit test

author: Terrell Burns
comment: I loved that.

author: Göksenin Güngör
comment: Cant download workouts they always stuck.

reply.author: FitWell Limited
reply.content: Hello Göksenin! Have you tried our last version? It should have fixed all of the problems. If problem still persists, can you reach us via support@fitwell.co?

author: Zari R
comment: Plz fix the syncing part.  It is syncing from Google fit when i want it to b synced from myfitnesspal. Whenever I enter the edit the wellness part, there is an error n all this html comes up.
title: Needs fixes

comment: This app poorly integrated with my smartphone and device. I had to redownload each workout over and over again in order to actually access it. And then when I'd be at the gym if I tried to open the work out it would start to download it again. I don't want to use my data up on some stupid video of a person doing it. I just need a quick explanation of the exercise and then a rep counter / timer. Honestly I wouldn't buy this app if I was anybody that is serious about exercising. I want my money back

reply.author: FitWell Limited
reply.content:
Hi Jame,
We are sorry to hear that you're not satisfied with the app. We provide personalised workout videos curated for you on the fly. We use videos simply because it helps to most if there is a visual representation and we use the benefit of professional trainers to maximise it. 
But we'll take your feedback into account for future releases!

title: Garbage

author: Rami Ben
comment: I really like this app and I want to use it everyday,  but I have a problem that I download the videos for the list of exercises but if i don't have Internet I can't access these videos.  Please fix this and I will give 5 stars.

author: Mauricio ET
comment: Fix Google Fit and Myfitnesspal syncing issues. Not syncing right day, step, water and calorie count. Daily limits not working, stay on zero. If I'm going to pay for premium, I expect results. Also, does not regularly pull myfitnesspal data for continuous analysis.

reply.author: FitWell Limited
reply.content:
Hi Mauricio,
Thank you for your feedback.
We are sorry to hear that you're experiencing problems. We are constantly improving our platform and integrations. If the problem still persists drop us a line at support@fitwell.co and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

title: Needs fixes

author: Richard Neal Bey
comment: Great for walking
title: R Neal Bey Gs/DM

author: Sharada Jogdand
comment: Loved it

author: Charity B.
comment: Any self respecting "fitness company" knows that the use of BMI is obsolete and useless. BMI knows nothing of body composition and is based off three things only: height, sex and weight. Any fitness app that uses BMI as a guage for anything is automatically discredited, in my opinion.
title: You had me until... BMI

author: Ayberk Usta
comment: I probably tried every single fitness app out there and non of them worked for me. However, FitWell changed my life: I work as a freelancer and I pretty much sit whole day with my computer or travel. Therefore, I dont have too much time to do exercise. But with this app you can work out anywhere and you dont need to have a gym or any gym equipment. Food loggings are amazing. Stepcounter is great and yet the REMINDERS are absolutely the BEST I ve seen so far. Big thank you for this life saving app! :)

reply.author: FitWell Limited
reply.content: Yunus selam, İlk olarak yaşanan problem için özür dileriz. Sana özel olarak bir e-posta gönderdik. Eğer ulaşmadıysa bize destek@fitwell.com.tr adresinden ulaşabilir misin?

title: The best fitness app out there!

author: Mrs KOkafor
comment: I love this app.  The only thing I feel its missing is custom meal and it doesn't have a good food database.  You should also be able to override your calories burn when doing the app exercise.  I use a HRM so my burn is more than the apps prediction.  Outside of that.  Love the exercises.
title: Missing

author: Ravi Nar
comment: Really strong and feature rich fitness application - about to embark on a mini-fitness regime so looking to put FitWell through its paces!

author: Erus Dublx
comment: Cannot log in back with my Facebook account, keeps saying password is wrong while Facebook says I already gave access to this app.
title: Cannot log in

author: Amed Zrikem
comment: Can't login with Facebook!
there are better alternatives

author: Kacy Schoenfeld
comment: Pasta and avacado? For a meal? Have some recipes please.  Then make shopping lists off of your recommended meals.
title: Meals?
